title: hugeblack
author: hugeblack
content: Please help me to choose a new avatar, in general it is about Fibonacci and/or an owl[1] (that say YO! ) + YO! mixer logo, PM me if you have any designs and I can send you my old avatar designs. I want a simple design. We can agree on a price, but I'd rather donating you using lightning network.In general, it is up to you if you want to send a free or paid design, but inform me about price before that.[1]

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on September 01, 2023, 02:44:51 PMI want a simple design. We can agree on a price, but I'd rather donating you using lightning network.In general, it is up to you if you want to send a free or paid design, but inform me about price before that.Can you tell me why you are choosing to have owl image for your avatar? I will think about some ideas and maybe I make something if I have free time, but maybe you should write how much you are willing to pay.Lightning network payments are ok for me.

comments.author: xLays
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on September 01, 2023, 03:42:04 PMQuote from: hugeblack on September 01, 2023, 02:44:51 PMI want a simple design. We can agree on a price, but I'd rather donating you using lightning network.In general, it is up to you if you want to send a free or paid design, but inform me about price before that.Can you tell me why you are choosing to have owl image for your avatar? I will think about some ideas and maybe I make something if I have free time, but maybe you should write how much you are willing to pay.Lightning network payments are ok for me.I'm not sure if I'm the only one noticing this and I don't have any idea about it. As you can see, the current Yo!Mix logo looks like an owl, if I'm not mistaken and that might be the reason why he wants to add an owl to his current avatar.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on September 01, 2023, 03:42:04 PMCan you tell me why you are choosing to have owl image for your avatar? I will think about some ideas and maybe I make something if I have free time, but maybe you should write how much you are willing to pay.Lightning network payments are ok for me.I like to see the Fibonacci series in nature, and the owl design represents that.source ---> https://www.deviantart.com/ark4n/art/The-Fibonacci-Little-Owl-372253531Quote from: xLays on September 01, 2023, 04:33:22 PMI'm not sure if I'm the only one noticing this and I don't have any idea about it. As you can see, the current Yo!Mix logo looks like an owl, if I'm not mistaken and that might be the reason why he wants to add an owl to his current avatar.that is correct

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on September 01, 2023, 02:44:51 PMI want a simple design. We can agree on a price, but I'd rather donating you using lightning network.In general, it is up to you if you want to send a free or paid design, but inform me about price before that.I'm truly interested in designing that avatar for you. I'm not a professional avatar designer by any means but recently in a contest run by Royse777 one of my avatar design was selected for final decision. Although, I didn't won the content but many of the users voted in favor of my design. I think I can help to design that avatar for you, and you don't need to pay me anything for the avatar design. I'll try my best to create a design that would be according to your specifications and I hope that my design will get a chance to be applied on your profile.

comments.author: xhomerx10
comments.created_time: September 01, 2023, 08:00:07 PMLast edit: September 01, 2023, 08:57:15 PM by xhomerx10
comments.body: edits: 1. tried to round edges slightly 2. added more brightness/contrast to the owl

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Since I am a fan of transparent images and avatars, this would be my choice.1.  2.

comments.author: xhomerx10
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on September 01, 2023, 08:36:13 PMSince I am a fan of transparent images and avatars, this would be my choice.1.  2.   Very cool.  I like the first one best.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: xhomerx10 on September 01, 2023, 08:40:55 PM  Very cool.  I like the first one best. I like your design also, it seems cheerful and happy. Just imagine, you reading hugeblack posts, and the avatar itself improves your mood   He cannot participate in serious discussions like that

comments.author: Onyeeze
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on September 01, 2023, 02:44:51 PMPlease help me to choose a new avatar, in general it is about Fibonacci and/or an owl[1] (that say YO! ) + YO! mixer logo, PM me if you have any designs and I can send you my old avatar designs. I want a simple design. We can agree on a price, but I'd rather donating you using lightning network.In general, it is up to you if you want to send a free or paid design, but inform me about price before that.[1]  The two logos are good but i will like you to use the two logo together it will be more unique, by using the owl to be inside the bestchange formal logo with yo!mix colors, because nobody is using the combination and if assume I know how to design the the logo I would have given you the picture of what I imagined to be use as avatar, because having the combination will be more unique than others.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: xhomerx10 on September 01, 2023, 08:00:07 PM    It's amazing. Thank you. I will wear it now.Quote from: examplens on September 01, 2023, 08:36:13 PMSince I am a fan of transparent images and avatars, this would be my choice.1.  2. Frankly, I liked the first design. I will switch between it and the design of @xhomerx10, but if the two were combined in a new design, it would be what I am looking for. thanks @examplensI'll leave the door open for any other ideas.

comments.author: xhomerx10
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on September 02, 2023, 09:58:22 AMQuote from: xhomerx10 on September 01, 2023, 08:00:07 PM    It's amazing. Thank you. I will wear it now.Quote from: examplens on September 01, 2023, 08:36:13 PMSince I am a fan of transparent images and avatars, this would be my choice.1.  2. Frankly, I liked the first design. I will switch between it and the design of @xhomerx10, but if the two were combined in a new design, it would be what I am looking for. thanks @examplensI'll leave the door open for any other ideas. Glad you like them.  Did you mean combining @examplens idea from his first illustration with mine?   Using the logo as a pair of glasses was artistic genius and just so you know, I did not ask @examplens for permission to use this idea in the avatar above.  While I was not seeking any LN bitcoin payment discussed in your post for any work rendered (just honing my skillset), I cannot speak for @examplens who may wish to be remunerated for his work and his ideas.  Obviously, I wouldn't know if any DMs were exchanged between the two of you. By the way, I loved your story about using the proceeds from the BestChange signature campaign to help pay your master's fee.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: I guess I'm late with this fun event with avatar, I have a layout just for the perspective of the owl and the background of Yomix hope you like it,   Do we have possible a lot of entries here? I would like to create more if possible. Thank you.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.created_time: September 02, 2023, 05:52:27 PMLast edit: September 03, 2023, 08:04:39 AM by SamReomo
comments.body: This the the first design that I have created for you.https://ibb.co/L1kMHzRFinal versions of the design with Yo! Mix original text and logo: Sent you the final version's PSD as PM.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: xhomerx10 on September 02, 2023, 11:18:32 AM Using the logo as a pair of glasses was artistic genius and just so you know, I did not ask @examplens for permission to use this idea in the avatar above.  While I was not seeking any LN bitcoin payment discussed in your post for any work rendered (just honing my skillset),Thank you I like the design, without glasses is better, it's like "I'm watching you" I'm wearing it now, you're a masterful designer.Quote from: Peanutswar on September 02, 2023, 11:37:07 AMDo we have possible a lot of entries here? I would like to create more if possible. Thank you.All of them are good, but they look like part of the official campaign, which unfortunately does not contain the owl logo, but it is very excellent for an official design.  Thank you very much for your effort and time spent on the design.Quote from: SamReomo on September 02, 2023, 05:52:27 PMThis is the initial version of the design and I have included full size image of the design as well. I'm working on another designs that I'm going to share very soon. I hope that you'll like this design! I will also share an improved version of this design. I'm pretty sure that the design will look good on your profile!It's good and funny, thanks for your effort, I wish the avatar animation was still working, I would have made his owl dance or do something funny.

comments.author: xLays
comments.body: I want to join your fun thread HugeBlack since I have a lot of free time. Feel free to use the avatar I created.This one is clean, without those icons from the YoMix website unlike 2nd avatar I made.Add some icons from the YoMix website.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Quote from: xhomerx10    edits: 1. tried to round edges slightly 2. added more brightness/contrast to the owl You have finished work here man, if they ask me to choose the best Avatar design in this thread, I think I will choose your owl as the best design among others because the two eyes of the owl show very well to identify.
